channel.title: Problem with HL2: EP2 achievment
channel.description:
Hi guys.
So, I don't know why, but I can't get the achievement "Little Rocket Man". I took that cursed gnome the entire game with me - except of the parts where I was going to return, like the autogun sequence, situations when I left the gnome on a easy place to find again. I've placed it inside the rocket two times know, on the same open hatch where Lammar enters.
In case you think I cheated, I didn't. Here's my Steam profile: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197976660739[/url] You can see there that I unlocked "Neighrborhood Watch" also. It was just 5 minutes ago.
I am considering that my internet connection went down by the times when the rocket lauched, but I really don't know.
H.P.
EDIT: I forgot to say: just after I closed the game, on my game screen on Steam, EP2 was "Syncing". I don't why, because I don't play my Steam games on other computers.

item.title: Problem with HL2: EP2 achievment
item.dc:creator: Power_Dust
item.description:
HumanParadoxx:

There were two times when I blasted this striders who were almost (and believe, “almost” represents the part of animation where the strider makes a pause between loading the singularity cannon and firing it) destroying the sawmill, and the other place just south of the water tank.

OMFG

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with HL2: EP2 achievment
item.dc:creator: papernick
item.description:
Jotie:

You have to close the hatch.
I did it once and forgot and had to start all over again.

Yes, I hadn’t thought of that. Didn’t think someone wouldn’t close the hatch, but the first time I played it I forgot to get Eli to do his blessing-scene, and had to start over.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with HL2: EP2 achievment
item.dc:creator: ashton93
item.description:
What he says is true. No other way to do it

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with HL2: EP2 achievment
item.dc:creator: HumanParadoxx
item.description:
Hi guys.

So, I don’t know why, but I can’t get the achievement “Little Rocket Man”.
I took that cursed gnome the entire game with me - except of the parts where I was going to return, like the autogun sequence, situations when I left the gnome on a easy place to find again.
I’ve placed it inside the rocket two times know, on the same open hatch where Lammar enters.

In case you think I cheated, I didn’t. Here’s my Steam profile:
https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561197976660739
You can see there that I unlocked “Neighrborhood Watch” also. It was just 5 minutes ago.

I am considering that my internet connection went down by the times when the rocket lauched, but I really don’t know.

H.P.

EDIT: I forgot to say: just after I closed the game, on my game screen on Steam, EP2 was “Syncing”. I don’t why, because I don’t play my Steam games on other computers.

Read full topic
